admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The extended inactivity period, and no
            disbursements of the Primary Health Care Project, led to its
            restructuring, resulting in the reallocation of the
            loan's entire amount towards financing emergency health
            interventions in the Marmara region, following the 1999
            earthquakes. This reallocation was approved in September
            1999, within an overall framework, financed from eight
            existing loans, to help provide immediate financing for
            repairs, reconstruction, and provision of social services.
            The loan was closed as stipulated in the amended Loan
            Agreement on June 30, 2002, and, the un-disbursed balance
            was cancelled on August 2001.
